verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Jesus loves children, hallelujah.
Jesus loves children, hallelujah.
Jesus loves children, hallelujah.
Jesus loves children, hallelujah.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: He died on the cross He, Hallelujah.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: He rose from the dead, hallelujah.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Soon He will come to us, Hallelujah.
